climbs.name: Test Your Carpet When it Beeps

content.description: Start as for Test drive on good holds on the bottom of the right side of the cave. Move up and left trending over towards Magic Carpet and then continue traversing left into the start of Beepers, finishing up that climb. This is essentially a traverse of the whole boulder.
content.protection: Several pads as the climb traverses the whole cave.
content.location: Starting on the rightmost side of the small cave trending left towards the exit/troll toll.

content.description: A easy climb with a fun exit to warm the hands up.
content.location: Sit below where jeepers creepers tops out and climb straight up. Top out as for jeepers creepers.

content.description: Sit start as for Test drive , traverse left on jugs until you can gain the slopy lip under the bulge. Continue moving left on slopers to set up for the same mantel as Magic Carpet.
Start at lowest point of big right facing sidepull that runs down the middle of the cave. climb out using all features in reach and top out straight up or left. classic!!!!
Start at the bottom of the large rail, as for Magic Carpet, but trend right within the cave (avoiding lip) and topout on right side of cave. A really cool line
content.location: starts in middle of cave and tops out on right side of cave

content.description: Start as for Beepers, use either of two small crimps below the lip to link into the rail in the middle of the cave used on Magic Carpet and Creep in the Jeep,  Move from that rail further right through the cave using a left hand crimp and then more edges to the right that lead to the same top out as Jeepers Creepers and Test Drive.
Start for Magic Carpet but instead of the direct topout, move left and mantle using slopey holds.
content.location: Small Cave.  Starts in the middle of the cave on the large right facing flake feature.

content.description: Start as for Test Drive, climb up and left to the lip, traverse left to the top of the rail of Magic Carpet, continue traversing the lip left to top out on slopey holds in between the Magic Carpet and Beepers topouts. Same finish/extension of Creep in the Jeep
content.protection: Several pads as this climb traverses the majority of the cave.
content.location: Starting as for Test Dive on the lowest right most holds in the cave, traversing left towards the left edge of the small cave.

content.description: Start on the large rail feature, as for Magic Carpet. Move up the rail and instead of topping Magic Carpet, trend left to the large jug below the lip and then use a few crimps to move left to the large jug as for Beepers, and from there finish as for Beepers by making the big move straight up to good hold on the lip. This is essentially the reverse of Beepers Carpet.
content.protection: Few pads, it traverses a bit.
content.location: Starting in the middle of the small cave and trending left towards the left side of the cave near the exit/troll toll.

content.description: Fun little linkup in the small cave. Tricky part is staying off the rock behind you. Keep your feet on!
content.location: Start as for Beepers on big jug on the left end of the cave. Make big move to small left facing hold under the lip, feet up, then grab "the jug" to the right. Top out as for Magic Carpet.

content.description: start on big jug down on far left side of cave and climb out of the cave and finish up and left
Small Cave past the troll toll in the "room like rock grouping"
